name: AEAssessmentSession
desc: A session that your app uses to protect an assessment.

items.name: func update(to: AEAssessmentConfiguration)
items.desc: Changes the session to use the specified configuration.

items.name: var configuration: AEAssessmentConfiguration
items.desc: The current configuration of the session.

items.name: class AEAssessmentConfiguration
items.desc: Configuration information for an assessment session.

items.name: var delegate: AEAssessmentSessionDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate to which the session provides state change updates.

items.name: protocol AEAssessmentSessionDelegate
items.desc: An interface that the session uses to provide information about session state changes to a delegate.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether an assessment session is running.
